Skinny-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Hat in braided paper straw with a decorative band. Width of brim 9 cm.

Bomber jacket in woven fabric with a sheen, ribbed stand-up collar, zip down the front and appliqué on the chest. Pockets in the side seams, a zipped inner pocket, zipped sleeve pocket and ribbing at the cuffs. Quilted lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with sparkly stones and a sewn-in turned-up hem.
Wide, checked blouse in soft viscose flannel with a V-neck and long, wide raglan sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Rounded hem, longer at the back.
Knee-length, V-neck dress in satin with short, wide sleeves. Seam at the waist with a double drawstring and slits in the sides.

Blouse in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise. Scallop-edged round neck with an opening and button at the back and long, trumpet sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a stand-up collar, covered buttons at the top and a gathered yoke. Long sleeves with cuffs and covered buttons.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Straight-cut dress in a soft, patterned weave with a wide neckline, long sleeves and softly draped front. Wide, sewn-on tie belt at the waist. Unlined.
Knee-length dress in an airy, patterned viscose weave in a straight cut with half-length sleeves that are open at the top with ties at the cuffs. Unlined.
Lace blouse with a stand-up collar, opening with a concealed button at the back of the neck and long sleeves with frilled cuffs. Lined with a jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a collar and concealed buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, wide, 3/4-length sleeves and a rounded hem.
Sleeveless blouse in an airy, patterned weave with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke with a pleat at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Short, straight-cut dress in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.

Dress in soft jersey with a unique nursing feature. The dress is fitted, knee-length and has 3/4-length sleeves. The design includes a double layer at the top to help you keep warm while allowing easy access to the bust for nursing.
Short skirt in soft twill made from Tencel™ lyocell with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Rounded hem with short slits in the sides. Unlined.
Scarf in a soft weave with a brushed finish. Fringes on the short sides. Size 65x195 cm.
5-pocket jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and straight legs.
Jacket in washed denim with a collar, buttons down the front and at the cuffs, flap chest pockets with a button, welt side pockets and adjustable tab and buttons at the sides.
Collarless, round-necked coat in soft faux fur with concealed press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Pleated skirt in woven fabric with a concealed zip and hook-and-eye fastener in the side.
Short skirt in imitation leather with a shimmering metallic finish and visible zip at the back. Lined.
T-shirt in soft jersey with embroidered appliqués.
Cold shoulder top in an airy weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck, lace yoke, flounce at the top and long sleeves with narrow elastication and a flounce at the cuffs.
Sheer jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with lace at the back, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
Sheer jersey top in a narrow cut at the top with lace at the back, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a button at the back of the neck.
